IOS012_SYSTEM_LOOP.issue: Unicode box-drawing character (U+2500) caused Windows encoding crash in print_summary()
IOS012_SYSTEM_LOOP.fix_applied: Replaced Unicode char at line 1036 with ASCII dashes
IOS012_SYSTEM_LOOP.pre_patch_behavior: Crash on Windows with UnicodeEncodeError when logging to non-UTF8 console
IOS012_SYSTEM_LOOP.post_patch_behavior: Deterministic ASCII output, no encoding exceptions

HMM_BACKFILL_V1.issue: DataFrame index mismatch with numpy array indices during regime prediction
HMM_BACKFILL_V1.fix_applied: Added reset_index(drop=True) and enumerate() at line 628-631
HMM_BACKFILL_V1.pre_patch_behavior: IndexError: index N is out of bounds for axis 0 with size M
HMM_BACKFILL_V1.post_patch_behavior: Correct array alignment, deterministic regime predictions

IOS013_HCP_G3_RUNNER.issue: No error handling for init failures caused hard crash on DB/import errors
IOS013_HCP_G3_RUNNER.fix_applied: Added graceful error handling with deterministic exit codes (2=dependency, 3=db, 130=SIGINT)
IOS013_HCP_G3_RUNNER.pre_patch_behavior: Unhandled exception on DB connection failure, no cleanup
IOS013_HCP_G3_RUNNER.post_patch_behavior: Graceful halt with appropriate exit code and status message

CALC_INDICATORS_V1.fix_applied: Vectorized all 4 persist functions with DataFrame merge + page_size=1000 batching
CALC_INDICATORS_V1.pre_patch_behavior: Timeout after 300s on large datasets, OOM on continuous load
